Is there any way to enable cheats with this? I've searched everywhere online but couldn't find any instructions for mac users. I've also searched in Library-> Preferences and did not find a swkotor2.ini file. I

Any way to enable cheats with this? Cannot find swkotor2.ini in Library -> Preferences. 

[sorry if this is a double post]

K never mind, I figured it out. To enable cheats:

Applications -> Knights of the Old Republic 2 -> Show Package Contents

Contents -> Resources -> transgaming -> c_drive -> Program Files -> SWKotOR2 -> swKotor2.ini

At the end of [Game Options] -> 
EnableCheats=1
Enable Console=1

Save.

~ key will enable invisible console. You should not be able to move while console is enabled.

People, games with DX11 can't be ported to the Mac, like BF3 or Black Ops 2 etc.

Some games like Max Payne 3 doesn't work because, for some, it doesn't even launch, for some, it's stuck in the loading screen (endless loading) etc.

Anyways, back to the game.
